data.title: Bathing, Sleeping & Dreaming
data.meta_description: Posts about Bathing, Sleeping & Dreaming written by ruudverkerk
data.text:
Almost everybody does it almost daily … taking a bath, go to sleep and dream a thousand dreams. Welcome to the wonderful world of album covers! It’s a nice theme whether you will see it or not. The Mama’s And The Papa’s did it all together: California Dreaming in a bathtub, Roger Daltrey took a bath in white beans with tomatosauce and Anne Murray found a hippo in her tub. Everything is possible. Then it’s time to go to bed, in the 1950’s a popular theme for record covers and dream about a world where everything is possible. With some exceptions you see here mostly women and hardly any men. The girl can’t help it … it’s a strange but also beautiful world. Welcome to Dreamsville.
